room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Such a fun experience! I've been to 3 different versions of an escape room in 3 different cities. This one took it to another level with the handcuffs! Proud to say we escaped this one!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: So much fun. Great family experience. Highly recommend !

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Awesome place! Can't wait to go back and try the second room!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Great fun!! Really makes you think.. The staff was excellent... Really cool event...

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had a great time trying to escape the prison room - we will definitely be back to try the other puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: It was intriguingly fun! I thought I was going to be scared or it would be dumb......nope! Very fun and I enjoyed using my mind for fun instead of drinking or loud music.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: Awesome staff and a fantastic time. I was in town by myself on business and did both rooms with total strangers, and it was a blast. Absolutely worth your time! Parking can be an issue, though, so arrive early!!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Escape" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had sooo much fun escaping the prison room!! It was like living in a real-life video game. I felt like my lifetime of gaming had led me to this moment! Great, funny staff.
